byline.original: By ADAM W. KEPLER; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF

abstract: Actress Zoe Caldwell will star in David Adjmi's new site-specific play Elective Affinities.
snippet: Zoe Caldwell would like to invite you for tea and sandwiches.
lead_paragraph: Zoe Caldwell would like to invite you for tea and sandwiches.

headline.main: Zoe Caldwell to Star On Upper East Side
